title: Kaspersky
extract: Kaspersky Anti-Virus (Russian: Антивирус Касперского (Antivirus Kasperskovo); formerly known as AntiViral Toolkit Pro; often referred to as KAV) is an antivirus program developed by Kaspersky Lab.
extract_html: Kaspersky Anti-Virus (Russian: Антивирус Касперского (Antivirus Kasperskovo); formerly known as AntiViral Toolkit Pro; often referred to as KAV) is an antivirus program developed by Kaspersky Lab.
